numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the academic performance of people in poverty and legacy applicants is about the same.
2. People in poverty have fewer chances of being admitted to a college than legacy applicants.
3. I wonder how many colleges provided this type of data.
4. I wonder which colleges provided this type of data.
5. This relates to my community in California.
6. In California, we can compare the chances of getting into a certain type of high school.
7. In California, we can compare the chances of getting into a certain type of middle school.
8. In California, we can compare the chances of getting into a certain type of elementary school.
9. The headline is: What are the chances of getting accepted in a good academic school depending on your money class?
